I'm not even thinking about the weather.

content.text: Hi! My name is Alice. I'm a huge fan of Dream Theater!
Awesome! They're my favorite band too. I'm currently on tour with them!
That's amazing! How did you get into music?
My dad was a musician, so I grew up around it. I started playing guitar when I was 6 years old.
That's awesome. Do you play any other instruments?
I also play bass and piano.
Thanks! I love music. It's my passion.
Me too! I love to listen to music and sing in the shower.
I love to sing too! I've been in a few bands.
That's so cool! I wish I could sing.
You should try it! It's really fun.
I might just do that. Thanks for the encouragement!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about music.
